sentences: Täna hommikul magati natuke rohkemat, kauem kui tarvis.
Kool poisse rohkemat kinni ei pidanud.
Rohkem ma seda välja ei kannata.
context: The word 'rohkemat' is an Estonian adverb that means 'longer' or 'for a longer time'. It's the comparative form of the word 'palju' (much/many) used to express duration rather than quantity. In this context, it indicates a greater length of time compared to some reference point or standard.
